plugin.name: animate
plugin._long: A plugin which provides animations when a window is opened or closed.

option.name: open_animation
option._long: Specifies the type of animation when opening a window.

option.name: close_animation
option._long: Specifies the type of animation when closing a window.

option.name: minimize_animation
option._long: Specifies the type of animation when minimizing a window.

option.name: enabled_for
option._short: Animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated.

option.name: duration
option._long: Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds.

option.name: startup_duration
option._short: System fade duration when Wayfire starts
option._long: Sets the duration of fading (in milliseconds) when Wayfire starts.

option.name: random_animations
option._long: Randomize animations for all events.

option.name: fade_enabled_for
option._short: Fade animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with a fade effect.

option.name: fade_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the _fade_ animation in milliseconds. Only applies for windows matched by `animate.fade_enabled_for`.

option.name: zoom_enabled_for
option._short: Zoom animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with a zoom effect.

option.name: zoom_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the _zoom_ animation in milliseconds. Only applies for windows matched by `animate.zoom_enabled_for`.

option.name: fire_enabled_for
option._short: Fire animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with a fire effect.

option.name: fire_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the _fire_ animation in milliseconds. Only applies for windows matched by `animate.fire_enabled_for`.

option.name: fire_particles
option._long: Sets the number of fire particles.

option.name: fire_particle_size
option._long: Sets the size of the fire particles in pixels.

option.name: random_fire_color
option._long: Sets whether to use one solid color or select a random color for each particle

option.name: fire_color
option._long: Sets the color of the fire effects, alpha is ignored

option.name: zap_enabled_for
option._short: Zap animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with the zap effect.

option.name: zap_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the zap animation in milliseconds.

option.name: spin_enabled_for
option._short: Spin animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with the spin effect.

option.name: spin_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the spin animation in milliseconds.

option.name: spin_direction
option._long: Forward spin direction.

option.name: spin_rotations
option._long: Number of rotations for the spin animation.

option.name: helix_enabled_for
option._short: Helix animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with the helix effect.

option.name: helix_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the helix animation in milliseconds.

option.name: helix_rotations
option._long: Number of rotations for the helix animation.

option.name: helix_strip_height
option._long: Height of each helix strip in pixels.

option.name: blinds_enabled_for
option._short: Blinds animation enabled for specified window types
option._long: Specifies the window types to be animated with the blinds effect.

option.name: blinds_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the blinds animation in milliseconds.

option.name: blinds_strip_height
option._long: Height of each blinds strip in pixels.

option.name: shatter_duration
option._long: Sets the duration for the shatter animation in milliseconds.

option.name: squeezimize_duration
option._long: Sets the duration of the squeezimize animation in milliseconds.
